    • Method Detail

      • send

        public EthereumTransactionResponse send(EthereumTransaction rawtx,
                                        TransactionConfig txConfig)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a transaction to Ethereum using the configuration pass as parameter
        Parameters:
        rawtx - A raw transaction which will be sent to Ethereum
        txConfig - Options which will be used to config the transaction
        Returns:
        The result of the request
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • signMessage

        public java.lang.String signMessage(java.lang.String message,
                                    java.lang.String privateKey)
        Sign a raw message with the given private key
        Parameters:
        message - A raw message which will be signed
        privateKey - The private key with which the raw message will be signed
        Returns:
        The signed message as hex string

      • signPersonalMessage

        public java.lang.String signPersonalMessage(java.lang.String message,
                                            java.lang.String privateKey)
        Sign a raw personal message with the given private key using https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-712.md
        Parameters:
        message - A raw message which will be signed
        privateKey - The private key with which the raw message will be signed
        Returns:
        The signed message as hex string

      • signTransaction

        public java.lang.String signTransaction(EthereumRawTransaction rawTransaction,
                                        java.lang.String privateKey)
        Sign a raw transaction with a given private key
        Parameters:
        rawTransaction - A raw transaction which will be signed with the privatekey
        privateKey - The private key with which the raw transaction will be signed
        Returns:
        The signed transaction

      • sendRawTransaction

        public EthereumTransactionResponse sendRawTransaction(EthereumTransaction rawTx)
                                               throws HancockException
        Send a raw transaction to the ethereum network (It is assumed that the "from" address which will sign the transaction is stored in the node)
        Parameters:
        rawTx - A raw transaction which will be sent to the network
        Returns:
        The result of the transaction
        Throws:
        HancockException

      • sendToSignProvider

        public EthereumTransactionResponse sendToSignProvider(EthereumTransaction rawTx,
                                                      TransactionConfig txConfig)
                                               throws HancockException
        Send a raw transaction to one of the sign providers registered in hancock
        Parameters:
        rawTx - A raw transaction which will be signed by the sign provider
        txConfig - Options which will be used to config the transaction (provider and callBack Options(optional))
        Returns:
        The result of the request
        Throws:
        HancockException

      • sendSignedTransaction

        public EthereumTransactionResponse sendSignedTransaction(java.lang.String signedTransaction,
                                                         TransactionConfig txConfig)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a signed transaction to the ethereum network
        Parameters:
        signedTransaction - A signed transaction which will be send to the network
        txConfig - Options which will be used to config the transaction
        Returns:
        The result of the transaction
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • sendSignedTransactionLocally

        public EthereumTransactionResponse sendSignedTransactionLocally(java.lang.String signedTransaction)
                                                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Send a signed transaction directly to a node of Ethereum
        Parameters:
        signedTransaction - A signed transaction which will be send to the network
        Returns:
        The transaction hash
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException

      • subscribe

        public HancockSocket subscribe(java.util.List<java.lang.String> addresses)
                        throws HancockException
        Create a websocket subscription to watch transactions of type "transactions" in the network
        Parameters:
        addresses - An array of address that will be added to the watch list
        Returns:
        A HancockSocket object which can add new subscriptions and listen incoming message
        Throws:
        HancockException

      • subscribe

        public HancockSocket subscribe(java.util.List<java.lang.String> addresses,
                               java.lang.String consumer)
                        throws HancockException
        Create a websocket subscription to watch transactions of type "transactions" in the network
        Parameters:
        addresses - An array of address that will be added to the watch list
        consumer - A consumer plugin previously configured in hancock that will handle each received event
        Returns:
        A HancockSocket object which can add new subscriptions and listen incoming message
        Throws:
        HancockException

      • subscribe

        public HancockSocket subscribe(java.util.List<java.lang.String> addresses,
                               java.util.function.Function callback)
                        throws HancockException
        Create a websocket subscription to watch transactions of type "transactions" in the network
        Parameters:
        addresses - An array of address that will be added to the watch list
        callback - A function to be called when the sockets has the connection ready. Has the socket as a param
        Returns:
        A HancockSocket object which can add new subscriptions and listen incoming message
        Throws:
        HancockException

      • subscribe

        public HancockSocket subscribe(java.util.List<java.lang.String> addresses,
                               java.lang.String consumer,
                               java.util.function.Function callback)
                        throws HancockException
        Create a websocket subscription to watch transactions of type "transactions" in the network
        Parameters:
        addresses - An array of address that will be added to the watch list
        consumer - A consumer plugin previously configured in hancock that will handle each received event
        callback - A function to be called when the sockets has the connection ready. Has the socket as a param
        Returns:
        A HancockSocket object which can add new subscriptions and listen incoming message
        Throws:
        HancockException
